item.title: Ariana Grande Posts Cryptic Announcement Teaser
item.description: The Grammy Award-winning singer is also slated to star in ‘Wicked: For Good,’ due out this November.

item.title: Santa Barbara Film Fest: ‘Wicked’ Star Cynthia Erivo Tapped for Kirk Douglas Award
item.description: The Oscar nominee and Emmy, Grammy and Tony winner will be feted on Dec. 4, less than two weeks after the release of ‘Wicked: For Good.’

item.title: ‘Wicked’ Star Marissa Bode on ‘For Good,’ Wanting to Do a Horror Movie Because She Loves ‘Blood and Guts’ and Queer and Disability Representation: ‘We Have to Keep Showing Up Out of Survival’
item.description: Marissa Bode had quite the introduction to San Diego Comic-Con Thursday night. Not only was it the first time the “Wicked” and “Wicked: For Good” star attended the San Diego convention, but she was al

item.title: New ‘Wicked’ Brand Collabs Fly in Ahead of November’s ‘Wicked: For Good’ Release
item.description: A running list of the latest and greatest movie-inspired clothing, beauty products, homeware, games and collectibles. Plus, a comprehensive list of collaborations from ‘Wicked: Part 1.’

item.title: Ariana Grande Promises She Won’t Abandon Music
item.description: The ‘Wicked: For Good’ star took to Instagram to reassure fans she wasn’t planning to leave music behind anytime soon.
